Pinyin1: zhège cí wǒmen xuéguò liǎngsāncì le 。
Chinese1: 这个词我们学过两三次了。
Translate1: We have learned this word two or three times.

Pinyin1: wǒ děng le nǐ sānsìgè xiǎoshí 。
Translate1: I have been waiting for you for three or four hours.

Pinyin1: tāmen qībānián méi jiànmiàn le 。
Translate1: They haven't seen each other for seven or eight years.

Pinyin1: yào zuò wán zhège gōngzuò xūyào yīliǎnggè yuè 。
Chinese1: 要做完这个工作需要一两个月。
Translate1: It will take a month or two to finish the job.

Pinyin1: tāmen jiā de háizi wǔliùsuì le bā 。
Chinese1: 他们家的孩子五六岁了吧。
Translate1: Their children are five or six years old.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú zhǐyào qībāshí kuàiqián 。
Chinese1: 这件衣服只要七八十块钱。
Translate1: This dress only costs seventy or eighty yuan.

Pinyin1: zhè jǐběnshū huā le wǒ liǎngsānbǎi 。
Chinese1: 这几本书花了我两三百。
Translate1: These books cost me two or three hundred.

Pinyin1: wǒdú ， nǐ tīng zhe 。
Translate1: I read, you listen.

Pinyin1: wǒmen zuò ， nǐmen kànzhe 。
Translate1: We do it, you watch.

Pinyin1: nǐmen zuò zhe ， wǒ mǎshàng huílai 。
Translate1: Sit down, I'll be right back.

Pinyin1: wǒ chūqù yīxià ， nǐ bāng wǒ kànzhe xíngli 。
Chinese1: 我出去一下，你帮我看着行李。
Translate1: I'll go out for a while, you help me look at the luggage.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan zhàn zhe chīfàn 。
Translate1: She likes to eat standing up.

Pinyin1: tā xiào zhe shuō “ duìbuqǐ ” 。
Translate1: He smiled and said "sorry".

Pinyin1: háizi bào zhe bàba kū le qǐlai 。
Chinese1: 孩子抱着爸爸哭了起来。
Translate1: The child hugged his father and cried.

Pinyin1: gōngsī de mén kāizhe ， kěshì méirén zài 。
Chinese1: 公司的门开着，可是没人在。
Translate1: The door of the company is open, but no one is there.

Pinyin1: tā chuānzhuó yītiáo xiǎohēiqún 。
Translate1: She is wearing a little black dress.

Pinyin1: tǎng zhe zuìshūfú 。
Translate1: Lying down is the most comfortable

Pinyin1: bié kèqi ， ná zhe bā 。
Translate1: You're welcome, take it.

Pinyin1: nǐmen děng zhe !
Translate1: you wait!

Pinyin1: nǐ bùyào shēngqì ， wǒ shì shuō zhe wán de 。
Chinese1: 你不要生气，我是说着玩的。
Translate1: Don't be angry, I'm just kidding.

Pinyin1: wǒ tīngbudǒng yīngwéngē ， zhǐshì tīng zhe wán de 。
Chinese1: 我听不懂英文歌，只是听着玩的。
Translate1: I don't understand English songs, I just listen to them.

Pinyin1: wǒ è le 。
Translate1: I'm hungry.

Pinyin1: háizi men dōu lěi le 。
Translate1: The kids are tired.

Pinyin1: tā lǎo le 。
Translate1: she is old.

Pinyin1: nǐ pàng le 。
Translate1: You are fat.

Pinyin1: nǐ shìbùshì shēngqì le ？
Translate1: Are you angry?

Pinyin1: xiàyǔ le 。
Translate1: It's raining.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo huì shuōhuà le 。
Translate1: The baby can talk.

Pinyin1: tā dāng jīnglǐ le 。
Translate1: He's a manager.

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu nǚpéngyou le ？
Translate1: you have a girlfriend

Pinyin1: wǒ nánpéngyou zhǎodào xīn gōngzuò le 。
Chinese1: 我男朋友找到新工作了。
Translate1: My boyfriend has found a new job.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù mǎi le 。
Translate1: I don't buy it.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù huíjiā chīwǎnfàn le 。
Translate1: I'm not going home for dinner.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù qù kàn diànyǐng le 。
Translate1: I don't go to the movies

Pinyin1: wǒ bù jiéhūn le 。
Translate1: I am not married anymore.

Pinyin1: nǐhǎo ma ？ wǒ hěn hǎo 。
Translate1: Are you OK? I'm very good.

Pinyin1: wǒ yě hěn hǎo 。
Translate1: I am fine too.

Pinyin1: zhège hěn hǎo ， nàgè ne ？
Translate1: This one is great, what about that one?

Pinyin1: zhège yòng zhōngwén zěnme shuō ？
Translate1: How do you say this in Chinese?

Pinyin1: wǒ zàijiā ， nǐ ne ？
Translate1: I'm at home, how about you?

Pinyin1: nǐ bàba shì shànghǎi rén ， nǐ māma ne ？
Chinese1: 你爸爸是上海人，你妈妈呢？
Translate1: Your father is from Shanghai, where is your mother?

Pinyin1: nǐ gēge yǒu gōngzuò ， dìdi ne ？
Translate1: Your brother has a job, where is your brother?

Pinyin1: běijīng xiàyǔ le 。
Translate1: It's raining in Beijing.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiànzài yào chūqù 。
Translate1: I'm going out now.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhīdào nǐ huì shuō zhōngwén 。
Translate1: I know you can speak Chinese.

Pinyin1: zhège zhōumò wǒ xiǎng qù jiǔbā 。
Translate1: I want to go to the bar this weekend.

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǎnshàng méikōng ？
Translate1: Not free tonight?

Pinyin1: qián ne ？
Translate1: Where is the money?

Pinyin1: nǐ māma ne ？
Translate1: Where's your mom?

Pinyin1: wǒ de shǒujī ne ？
Translate1: Where is my cell phone?

Pinyin1: xiǎo lǐ de fángzi
Translate1: Li's house

Pinyin1: hóngsè de zìxíngchē
Translate1: red bike

Pinyin1: wǒ de shǒujī
Translate1: My cell phone

Pinyin1: wǒmen de lǎoshī
Translate1: our teacher

Pinyin1: piàoliang de yīfú
Translate1: beautiful clothes

Pinyin1: rènao de jiǔbā
Translate1: lively bar

Pinyin1: wǒ nǚpéngyou de gōngsī
Translate1: my girlfriend's company

Pinyin1: zuò dé hěn hǎo
Translate1: well-done

Pinyin1: shuō dé tàikuài
Translate1: speak too fast

Pinyin1: wándé hěn kāixīn
Translate1: have fun

Pinyin1: kāi dé hěnkuài
Translate1: drive fast

Pinyin1: zhù dé hěn shūfu
Translate1: live comfortably

Pinyin1: shēngqì deshuō
Translate1: say angrily

Pinyin1: kāixīn dìxiào
Translate1: laugh happily

Pinyin1: mànmàn dì zǒu
Translate1: walk slowly

Pinyin1: shāngxīndì kū
Translate1: cry sadly

Pinyin1: rènzhēn dì tīng
Translate1: listen carefully

Pinyin1: jīntiān de zuòyè nǐ zuò dé bùhǎo ， yīnwèi nǐ méi rènzhēn dì tīngkè 。
Chinese1: 今天的作业你做得不好，因为你没认真地听课。
Translate1: You didn't do your homework well today because you didn't pay attention to the class.

Pinyin1: guānyú zhōngguó lìshǐ ， wǒ zhīdào de bù duō 。
Chinese1: 关于中国历史，我知道的不多。
Translate1: I don't know much about Chinese history.

Pinyin1: guānyú zhècì kǎoshì ， wǒ háiyǒu jǐge wèntí yào wèn 。
Chinese1: 关于这次考试，我还有几个问题要问。
Translate1: I have a few more questions about this exam.

Pinyin1: guānyú zhège wèntí ， nǐmen háishi wèn tā bā 。
Chinese1: 关于这个问题，你们还是问他吧。
Translate1: You should ask him about this question.

Pinyin1: guānyú nǐ de jiànyì ， lǎobǎn huán zài kǎolǜ 。
Chinese1: 关于你的建议，老板还在考虑。
Translate1: The boss is still considering your suggestion.

Pinyin1: guānyú diàochájiéguǒ ， wǒmen yě bù tài qīngchu 。
Chinese1: 关于调查结果，我们也不太清楚。
Translate1: We also don't know much about the results of the survey.

Pinyin1: wǎngshàng yǒu hěnduō guānyú zhèjiàn shìqing de pínglùn 。
Chinese1: 网上有很多关于这件事情的评论。
Translate1: There are many comments on the Internet about this matter.

Pinyin1: tā xiě guò hěnduō guānyú nánnǚpíngděng de wénzhāng 。
Chinese1: 他写过很多关于男女平等的文章。
Translate1: He has written a lot about equality between men and women.

Pinyin1: hànyǔ yǒu hěnduō guānyú yǐnshí de chéngyǔ 。
Chinese1: 汉语有很多关于饮食的成语。
Translate1: Chinese has many idioms about diet.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiān kàn le yībù guānyú dòngwù bǎohù de jìlùpiàn 。
Chinese1: 我昨天看了一部关于动物保护的纪录片。
Translate1: I watched a documentary about animal protection yesterday.

Pinyin1: zhèshì yífèn guānyú zhōngguó shēchǐpǐn shìchǎng de bàogào 。
Chinese1: 这是一份关于中国奢侈品市场的报告。
Translate1: This is a report on China's luxury goods market.

Pinyin1: wǒmen liáoliao nǐ de xīn gōngzuò bā 。
Chinese1: 我们聊聊你的新工作吧。
Translate1: Let's chat about your new job.

Pinyin1: jīntiān kāihuì yàoshuō shuō gōngsī xiàgèyuè de péixùn 。
Chinese1: 今天开会要说说公司下个月的培训。
Translate1: We have a meeting today to talk about the company's training next month.

Pinyin1: zhídào shíèrdiǎn bàn ， wǒ cái zuòwánzuòyè 。
Chinese1: 直到十二点半，我才做完作业。
Translate1: I didn't finish my homework until half past twelve.

Pinyin1: zhídào bànge yuè yǐhòu ， wǒ de gǎnmào cái hǎo 。
Chinese1: 直到半个月以后，我的感冒才好。
Translate1: It wasn't until half a month later that my cold got better.

Pinyin1: tā zhídào shíbāsuì cái jiàndào qīnshēngfùmǔ 。
Chinese1: 她直到十八岁才见到亲生父母。
Translate1: She didn't meet her biological parents until she was eighteen.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhídào dàxuébìyè cái kāishǐ dúlì shēnghuó 。
Chinese1: 我直到大学毕业才开始独立生活。
Translate1: I didn't start living independently until I graduated from college.

Pinyin1: zhídào qù le běijīng ， tā cái zhīdào yīgè rén zài dàchéngshì duō xīnkǔ 。
Chinese1: 直到去了北京，他才知道一个人在大城市多辛苦。
Translate1: It wasn't until he went to Beijing that he realized how hard it is for a person to live in a big city.

Pinyin1: zhídào tā bān dào shànghǎi ， wǒmen dōu méijiàn guò 。
Chinese1: 直到他搬到上海，我们都没见过。
Translate1: We didn't see him until he moved to Shanghai.

Pinyin1: tāmen shì tóngxué ， dànshì zhídào bìyè ， dōu méi shuō guò huà 。
Chinese1: 他们是同学，但是直到毕业，都没说过话。
Translate1: They are classmates, but they haven't spoken to each other until graduation.

Pinyin1: zhídào diànyǐng jiéshù ， tā dōu méilái 。
Chinese1: 直到电影结束，他都没来。
Translate1: He didn't come until the end of the movie.

Pinyin1: zhídào wǒ dìdi shàng dàxué ， tā dōu bùhuì xǐyīfú 。
Chinese1: 直到我弟弟上大学，他都不会洗衣服。
Translate1: Until my brother went to college, he couldn't do laundry.

Pinyin1: wǒ rènshi tā yīnián duō le ， zhídàoxiànzài ， wǒ dōu bù zhīdào tā de quánmíng 。
Chinese1: 我认识他一年多了，直到现在，我都不知道他的全名。
Translate1: I've known him for over a year, and until now, I don't know his full name.

Pinyin1: xiàngdōngzǒu 。
Translate1: go east.

Pinyin1: xiàngqián kàn 。
Translate1: look ahead.

Pinyin1: xiàngzuǒzhuǎn 。
Translate1: turn left.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī zhèngxiàng wǒmen zǒulái 。
Translate1: The teacher is coming to us.

Pinyin1: huǒchē yǐjīng kāi le ， tā huán zài xiàng wǒ zhāoshǒu 。
Chinese1: 火车已经开了，她还在向我招手。
Translate1: The train has already left, and she is still waving to me.

Pinyin1: nǐ bìxū xiàng tā dàoqiàn ！
Translate1: You must apologize to him!

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì nǐ yīnggāi xiàng lǎobǎn huìbào yīxià 。
Chinese1: 这件事你应该向老板汇报一下。
Translate1: You should report this to your boss.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù xǐhuan xiàng péngyou jièqián 。
Translate1: I don't like to borrow money from friends.

Pinyin1: nǐ huì xiàng mòshēngrén qiúzhù ma ？
Translate1: Would you ask a stranger for help?

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu méi jīngyàn ， shì lái xiàng nǐ qǐngjiào de 。
Chinese1: 我们都没经验，是来向你请教的。
Translate1: We have no experience and are here to ask you for advice.

Pinyin1: dàngāo kànqǐlai hěn hàochī 。
Translate1: The cake looks delicious.

Pinyin1: zhèjiā cāntīng kànqǐlai bùcuò 。
Translate1: This restaurant looks nice.

Pinyin1: nǐ nánpéngyou kànqǐlai hěn chéngshú 。
Chinese1: 你男朋友看起来很成熟。
Translate1: Your boyfriend looks mature.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn kànqǐlai yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng 。
Chinese1: 老板看起来有点不高兴。
Translate1: The boss looked a little unhappy.

Pinyin1: nǐmen kànqǐlai chàbuduō gāo 。
Translate1: You guys look about the same height.

Pinyin1: nǐ māma zhēn niánqīng ！ kànqǐlai xiàng nǐ jiějie 。
Chinese1: 你妈妈真年轻！看起来像你姐姐。
Translate1: Your mother is so young! looks like your sister.

Pinyin1: wǒ kànqǐlai xiàngbùxiàng dà lǎobǎn ？
Chinese1: 我看起来像不像大老板？
Translate1: Do I look like a big boss?

Pinyin1: nǐmen liǎ kànqǐlai xiàng qínglǚ 。
Translate1: You two look like a couple.

Pinyin1: tāmen kànqǐlai bùxiàng yǒuqiánrén 。
Chinese1: 他们看起来不像有钱人。
Translate1: They don't look like rich people.

Pinyin1: nàgè hēzuì de nánrén kànqǐlai xiàng nǐ lǎogong 。
Chinese1: 那个喝醉的男人看起来像你老公。
Translate1: That drunk man looks like your husband.

Pinyin1: xiǎozhāng méiyǒu xiǎo lǐgāo 。
Translate1: Xiao Zhang is not as tall as Xiao Li.

Pinyin1: xiǎolǐ méiyǒu xiǎozhāng ǎi 。
Translate1: Xiao Li is not as short as Xiao Zhang.

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng méiyǒu shànghǎi hàowán 。
Chinese1: 这个地方没有上海好玩。
Translate1: This place is not as fun as Shanghai.

Pinyin1: huǒchē méiyǒu fēijī kuài 。
Translate1: Trains are not as fast as planes.

Pinyin1: tā méiyǒu tā dìdi cōngming 。
Translate1: He is not as clever as his brother.

Pinyin1: nǐmen gōngsī méiyǒu wǒmen gōngsī dà 。
Chinese1: 你们公司没有我们公司大。
Translate1: Your company is not as big as ours.

Pinyin1: zuò gōngjiāochē méiyǒu zuòdìtiě fāngbiàn 。
Chinese1: 坐公交车没有坐地铁方便。
Translate1: Taking the bus is not as convenient as taking the subway.

Pinyin1: xiǎomǐ shǒujī méiyǒu píngguǒ shǒujī guì 。
Chinese1: 小米手机没有苹果手机贵。
Translate1: Xiaomi phones are not as expensive as Apple phones.

Pinyin1: bàba zuò de cài méiyǒu māma zuò de cài hàochī 。
Chinese1: 爸爸做的菜没有妈妈做的菜好吃。
Translate1: The dishes made by my father are not as good as those made by my mother.

Pinyin1: nǐ wèishénme bùràng wǒ qù ？
Translate1: why don't you let me go?

Pinyin1: zhèbù diànyǐng ràng rén hěn gǎndòng 。
Translate1: This movie is very touching.

Pinyin1: nàgè rén ràng wǒ xiǎngdào le wǒ gēge 。
Chinese1: 那个人让我想到了我哥哥。
Translate1: That person reminds me of my brother.

Pinyin1: tā bùtīnghuà ， nǐ jiào wǒ zěnmebàn ？
Chinese1: 他不听话，你叫我怎么办？
Translate1: He is disobedient, what do you tell me to do?

Pinyin1: tā tōutōu yuē biéde nǚhái ， nǐ jiào wǒ zěnme xiǎng ？
Chinese1: 他偷偷约别的女孩，你叫我怎么想？
Translate1: What do you think of him secretly dating other girls?

Pinyin1: nǐ érzi zài xuéxiào de biǎoxiàn jiào lǎoshī hěn tóuténg 。
Chinese1: 你儿子在学校的表现叫老师很头疼。
Translate1: Your son's behavior at school is giving the teacher a headache.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ bāng wǒ yīgè máng 。
Translate1: I want to ask you to do me a favor.

Pinyin1: néng bùnéng qǐng nǐ míngtiān zhàogu yīxià wǒ de gǒu ？
Chinese1: 能不能请你明天照顾一下我的狗？
Translate1: Could you please take care of my dog tomorrow?

Pinyin1: tā de yǎnjiǎng shǐ tīngzhòng men fēicháng jīdòng 。
Chinese1: 他的演讲使听众们非常激动。
Translate1: His speech thrilled the audience.

Pinyin1: jīngjìwēijī shǐ hěnduō gōngsī dǎobì le ， yě shǐ hěnduō rén shīqù le gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 经济危机使很多公司倒闭了，也使很多人失去了工作。
Translate1: The economic crisis closed down many companies and caused many people to lose their jobs.

Pinyin1: wǒ měitiān shàngbān dōu jīngguò zhèlǐ 。
Chinese1: 我每天上班都经过这里。
Translate1: I pass by here every day to work.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuòhuǒchē huílǎojiā chángcháng jīngguò zhège chéngshì 。
Chinese1: 我坐火车回老家常常经过这个城市。
Translate1: I often pass through this city on the train back home.

Pinyin1: nǐ jīngguò wǒ jiāménkǒu de shíhou jiào wǒ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 你经过我家门口的时候叫我一下。
Translate1: Call me when you pass my door.

Pinyin1: tā jīngguò zhège kāfēidiàn de shíhou jiù huì xiǎngdào tā 。
Chinese1: 她经过这个咖啡店的时候就会想到他。
Translate1: Passing by this coffee shop, she would think of him.

Pinyin1: jīngguò zìjǐ de nǔlì ， tā kǎoshàng le běijīngdàxué 。
Chinese1: 经过自己的努力，她考上了北京大学。
Translate1: Through her own efforts, she was admitted to Peking University.

Pinyin1: jīngguò liǎnggè yuè de zhǔnbèi ， tā shùnlì dì tōngguò le zhècì miànshì 。
Chinese1: 经过两个月的准备，他顺利地通过了这次面试。
Translate1: After two months of preparation, he successfully passed the interview.

Pinyin1: jīngguò zhè jǐnián de fāzhǎn ， zhège chéngshì fāshēng le hěndà biànhuà 。
Chinese1: 经过这几年的发展，这个城市发生了很大变化。
Translate1: After several years of development, the city has undergone great changes.

Pinyin1: wǒ yīnggāi gěi nǐ duōshǎo qián ？
Translate1: How much should I give you?

Pinyin1: gǎnmào de shíhou yīnggāi hē rèshuǐ 。
Chinese1: 感冒的时候应该喝热水。
Translate1: When you have a cold, you should drink hot water.

Pinyin1: míngtiān nǐ yīnggāi bādiǎnbàn lái gōngsī 。
Chinese1: 明天你应该八点半来公司。
Translate1: You should come to the company at half past eight tomorrow.

Pinyin1: tātàilěi le ， yīnggāi huíjiā xiūxi 。
Chinese1: 他太累了，应该回家休息。
Translate1: He is too tired, he should go home and rest.

Pinyin1: nǐ bù yīnggāi gàosu tā 。
Translate1: You shouldn't have told him.

Pinyin1: tā bù yīnggāi dǎrén 。
Translate1: He shouldn't hit people.

Pinyin1: wǒmen bù yīnggāi chídào 。
Translate1: We shouldn't be late.

Pinyin1: nǐmen bù yīnggāi xiào tā 。
Translate1: You shouldn't laugh at her.

Pinyin1: nǐmen bù yīnggāi ná biéren de dōngxi 。
Chinese1: 你们不应该拿别人的东西。
Translate1: You should not take other people's things.

Pinyin1: zhèjù huà hěn nándǒng 。
Translate1: This sentence is difficult to understand.

Pinyin1: hànyǔ hěn nánxué 。
Translate1: Chinese is difficult to learn.

Pinyin1: zhōngguó cài hěn nán zuò 。
Translate1: Chinese food is hard to cook.

Pinyin1: zhège dōngxi xiànzài hěnnán mǎi 。
Translate1: This stuff is hard to buy right now.

Pinyin1: zhège hànzì hěnnán xiě 。
Translate1: This Chinese character is difficult to write.

Pinyin1: nǐ zuò de cài hěn nánchī 。
Translate1: The food you cook is terrible.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de kāfēi hěnnán hē 。
Translate1: The coffee here is terrible.

Pinyin1: zhè shǒugē hěn nántīng 。
Translate1: This song is ugly.

Pinyin1: zhèzhǒng huā hěn nánwén 。
Translate1: This flower smells bad.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú hěn nánkàn ma ？
Translate1: Is this dress ugly?

Pinyin1: tāxué le yīnián zhōngwén 。
Translate1: He studied Chinese for one year.

Pinyin1: wǒ kàn le yīgè wǎnshàng shū 。
Translate1: I read a book all night.

Pinyin1: tā zuò le bānián jīnglǐ 。
Translate1: He was a manager for eight years.

Pinyin1: wǒmen zuò le shíwǔgè xiǎoshí de fēijī 。
Chinese1: 我们坐了十五个小时的飞机。
Translate1: We were on a fifteen hour plane.

Pinyin1: wǒ kàn le yītiān de diànshì 。
Translate1: I watched TV all day.

Pinyin1: māma xǐ le yīshàngwǔ de yīfú 。
Chinese1: 妈妈洗了一上午的衣服。
Translate1: Mom washed the clothes all morning.

Pinyin1: háizi men zhōuliù xiě le yītiān de zuòyè 。
Chinese1: 孩子们周六写了一天的作业。
Translate1: The children had homework for the day on Saturday.

Pinyin1: wǒ gāngcái dǎ le bànge xiǎoshí diànhuà 。
Chinese1: 我刚才打了半个小时电话。
Translate1: I was on the phone for half an hour just now.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiān wán le yī wǎnshàng yóuxì 。
Chinese1: 我昨天玩了一晚上游戏。
Translate1: I played the game all night yesterday.

Pinyin1: tā zuótiān kāi le yītiān de chē 。
Translate1: He drove all day yesterday.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn jīntiān kāi le yī xiàwǔ de huì 。
Chinese1: 老板今天开了一下午的会。
Translate1: The boss had a meeting all afternoon today.

Pinyin1: nǐ shuì le yītiān le 。
Translate1: You have slept all day.

Pinyin1: tā zài běijīng zhù le liǎngnián le 。
Translate1: He has lived in Beijing for two years.

Pinyin1: zhège huì ， tāmen kāi le liǎnggè xiǎoshí le 。
Chinese1: 这个会，他们开了两个小时了。
Translate1: They've had this meeting for two hours.

Pinyin1: wǒ zài zhèr děng le bànge xiǎoshí le 。
Chinese1: 我在这儿等了半个小时了。
Translate1: I've been waiting here for half an hour.

Pinyin1: tāmen zài jiǔbā dài le yīgè wǎnshàng le 。
Chinese1: 他们在酒吧待了一个晚上了。
Translate1: They've been at the bar all night.

Pinyin1: wǒxué zhōng wénxué le yīnián le 。
Translate1: I have studied Chinese for one year.

Pinyin1: tā dǎdiànhuà dǎ le yīgèduō xiǎoshí le 。
Chinese1: 他打电话打了一个多小时了。
Translate1: He's been on the phone for over an hour.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn dǎyóuxì dǎ le yīgè shàngwǔ le 。
Chinese1: 老板打游戏打了一个上午了。
Translate1: The boss has been playing games all morning.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐzǎo xǐ le chàbuduō yīgè xiǎoshí le 。
Chinese1: 你洗澡洗了差不多一个小时了。
Translate1: It's been almost an hour since you showered.

Pinyin1: māma kàndiànshì kàn le yī wǎnshàng le 。
Chinese1: 妈妈看电视看了一晚上了。
Translate1: Mom has been watching TV all night.

Pinyin1: jīntiān tàimáng le ， zhōngwǔ méi bànfǎ chūqù chīfàn 。
Chinese1: 今天太忙了，中午没办法出去吃饭。
Translate1: I'm too busy today to go out for lunch.

Pinyin1: tā méidài shǒujī ， méi bànfǎ gěi wǒ dǎdiànhuà 。
Chinese1: 他没带手机，没办法给我打电话。
Translate1: He didn't have a cell phone, so he couldn't call me.

Pinyin1: méiyǒu shuǐ ， wǒmen méi bànfǎ xǐyīfú 。
Chinese1: 没有水，我们没办法洗衣服。
Translate1: We can't do laundry without water.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ tàichǎo le ， wǒ méi bànfǎ gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 这里太吵了，我没办法工作。
Translate1: It's so loud in here that I can't work.

Pinyin1: tā bù kāimén ， suǒyǐ tā méi bànfǎ jìnqù 。
Chinese1: 他不开门，所以她没办法进去。
Translate1: He won't open the door, so she can't get in.

Pinyin1: nǐ bùhuì shuō zhōngwén ， méi bànfǎ zài wǒmen gōngsī gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 你不会说中文，没办法在我们公司工作。
Translate1: You can't speak Chinese, so you can't work in our company.

Pinyin1: shìqing tàiduō le ， wǒ jīntiān méi bànfǎ zuò wán 。
Chinese1: 事情太多了，我今天没办法做完。
Translate1: There are so many things I can't finish today.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn bù tóngyì ， wǒ méi bànfǎ bāng nǐ 。
Chinese1: 老板不同意，我没办法帮你。
Translate1: The boss disagrees, so I can't help you.

Pinyin1: tā hěn bèn ， wǒ méi bànfǎ gēn tā yīqǐ gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 他很笨，我没办法跟他一起工作。
Translate1: He's stupid and I can't work with him.

Pinyin1: shuō shuō nǐ de xiǎngfǎ 。
Translate1: Tell me what you think.

Pinyin1: chūqù wánwán bā ！
Translate1: Go out and have fun!

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng chūqù zǒuzǒu 。
Translate1: I want to go out for a walk.

Pinyin1: biéshēngqì le ， xiàoyīxiào ！
Translate1: Stop being angry and smile!

Pinyin1: nǐ qù wènyīwèn tāmen cèsuǒ zài nǎlǐ 。
Chinese1: 你去问一问他们厕所在哪里。
Translate1: You go and ask them where the toilet is.

Pinyin1: wǒ kěyǐ yòng yīyòng nǐ de diànnǎo ma ？
Chinese1: 我可以用一用你的电脑吗？
Translate1: Can I use your computer?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiànzài yǒu shíjiān ma ？
Translate1: Do you have time now?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng chángyīcháng wǒ zuò de cài ma ？
Chinese1: 你想尝一尝我做的菜吗？
Translate1: Do you want to try my cooking?

Pinyin1: wǒ hěn xiǎng nǐ 。
Translate1: I miss you.

Pinyin1: tā hěn xǐhuan nǐ 。
Translate1: He likes you very much.

Pinyin1: nǐ yīnggāi hěn xiǎoxīn 。
Translate1: You should be very careful.

Pinyin1: wǒ hěn pà wǎnshàng yīgè rén zàijiā 。
Chinese1: 我很怕晚上一个人在家。
Translate1: I'm terrified of being home alone at night.

Pinyin1: nǐ yīnggāi hěn liǎojiě zìjǐ de háizi 。
Chinese1: 你应该很了解自己的孩子。
Translate1: You should know your child well.

Pinyin1: nǐ liǎngtiān méi huíjiā ， māma hěn dānxīn nǐ 。
Chinese1: 你两天没回家，妈妈很担心你。
Translate1: You haven't come home for two days, and your mother is very worried about you.
